Plot: Winter, 1915. Confined by her family to an asylum in the South of France - where she will never sculpt again - the chronicle of Camille Claudel's reclusive life, as she waits for a visit from her brother, Paul Claudel.
Title: Camille Claudel 1915
Writer: Paul Claudel (letters), Camille Claudel (letters), Bruno Dumont (scenario and dialogue)
Actors: Juliette Binoche, Jean-Luc Vincent, Robert Leroy, Marion Keller
tomatoConsensus: Camille Claudel, 1915 isn't an easy watch, but Juliette Binoche's excellent performance makes it worth the effort.
